title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\ExclusionRule
name: ExclusionRule
description:
The rule that specifies conditions when findings of infoTypes specified in InspectionRuleSet are removed from results.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.ExclusionRule

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.exclude_info_types
params.description: Set of infoTypes for which findings would affect this rule.

params.name: data.exclude_by_hotword
params.description: Drop if the hotword rule is contained in the proximate context. For tabular data, the context includes the column name.

params.name: data.matching_type
params.description: How the rule is applied, see MatchingType documentation for details.
